extendedInfo.description: Play this game at the "Life Beyond Earth" exhibit at the Maryland Science Center, in Baltimore's Inner Harbor. As you explore the exhibit, draw cards about planets orbiting other stars, the ingredients of life, and the ways that life adapts to extreme environments. Choose carefully to make your best pair of cards, then submit your hand to earn Astrobucks -- and a coupon at the museum shop!This game is designed to be played at the Maryland Science Center, but if you want to try it at home, use these keycodes. (There are lots more at the museum!)206593461275Find out more about the Maryland Science Center: http://www.marylandsciencecenter.org
